title: SuperCollider TTS
description: Communication to SuperCollider to assemble TTS segments with non-speech audio.

audioTemplate.description: A template indicating the order of TTS segments and where joining words are located.

ordering.description: The type of ordering to use when rendering the description of the scene.

objects.description: Object list generated by the object detection preprocessor. This should reference the actual schema.

groups.description: Groupings composed of a subset of objects detected. This should reference the actual schema.

ttsFileName.description: The name of the file containing the TTS audio. This will be in the same directory as the file implementing this object.
